attributes.title: Successful SSH logins [Filebeat System] ECS
attributes.visState: {"type": "histogram", "listeners": {}, "title": "Successful SSH logins ECS", "params": {"defaultYExtents": false, "addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "addTimeMarker": false, "mode": "stacked", "scale": "linear", "times": [], "legendPosition": "right", "setYExtents": false}, "aggs": [{"enabled": true, "schema": "metric", "id": "1", "params": {}, "type": "count"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "segment", "id": "2", "params": {"interval": "auto", "field": "@timestamp", "min_doc_count": 1, "customInterval": "2h", "extended_bounds": {}}, "type": "date_histogram"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "group", "id": "3", "params": {"order": "desc", "field": "system.auth.ssh.method", "size": 5, "orderBy": "1"}, "type": "terms"}]}

attributes.title: SSH login attempts [Filebeat System] ECS
attributes.visState: {"type": "histogram", "listeners": {}, "title": "SSH login attempts ECS", "params": {"defaultYExtents": false, "addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "addTimeMarker": false, "mode": "stacked", "scale": "linear", "times": [], "legendPosition": "right", "setYExtents": false}, "aggs": [{"enabled": true, "schema": "metric", "id": "1", "params": {}, "type": "count"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "segment", "id": "2", "params": {"interval": "auto", "field": "@timestamp", "min_doc_count": 1, "customInterval": "2h", "extended_bounds": {}}, "type": "date_histogram"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "group", "id": "3", "params": {"order": "desc", "field": "system.auth.ssh.event", "size": 5, "orderBy": "1"}, "type": "terms"}]}

attributes.title: SSH users of failed login attempts [Filebeat System] ECS
attributes.visState: {"type": "tagcloud", "listeners": {}, "title": "SSH users of failed login attempts ECS", "params": {"orientation": "single", "scale": "linear", "minFontSize": 18, "maxFontSize": 72}, "aggs": [{"enabled": true, "schema": "metric", "id": "1", "params": {}, "type": "count"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "segment", "id": "2", "params": {"order": "desc", "field": "user.name", "size": 50, "orderBy": "1"}, "type": "terms"}]}
